Type Alias# CountableRange

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.10+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
typealias CountableRange<Bound> = Range<Bound> where Bound : Strideable, Bound.Stride : SignedInteger
```
